title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.158 - Inpatient bed count day
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.158 - Inpatient bed count day

State Regulations
A unit of measure denoting the presence of one inpatient
bed (either occupied or vacant) set up and staffed for use in one 24-hour
period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.158

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
